docs.text: Biography ¶ I am a first-year Ph.D. student in Soochow University, where I am a member of Soochow NLP Lab , majored in software engineering. I am advised by Prof. Qiaoming Zhu and Prof. Peifeng Li. Before that, I obtained the bachelor degree from China University of Petroleum (East China) , QinDao Institute Of Software, College Of Computer Science And Technology in 2022. More about me ¶ Github Resume Zhihu Email Research Interests ¶ Natual Language Processing Dialogue System Large Language Model Publications ¶ Two-stage Incomplete Utterance Rewriting on Editing Operation Zhiyu Cao , Peifeng Li, Qiaoming Zhu, Yaxin Fan Proceedings of the 31 st International Conference on Computational Linguistics COLING 2025 | Paper Incomplete Utterance Rewriting with Editing Operation Guidance and Utterance Augmentation Zhiyu Cao , Peifeng Li, Yaxin Fan, Qiaoming Zhu Proceedings of the 2024 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing EMNLP 2024 | Paper Education ¶ Soochow University Ph.D. in software engineering 2024.9-2028.6 (Expected) Soochow University Master student in software engineering 2022.9-2024.6 China University of Petroleum (East China) undergraduate in software engineering 2018.9-2022.6 Honors & Awards ¶ First National Prize , The 15 th LanQiao Cup, June 2024 Second Prize , The 5 th IKCEST "the Belt and Road" International Big Data competition and the 9 th Baidu & Xi'an Jiaotong University Big Data Competition, November 2023 Silver Award , The 19 th Baidu Star Programming Contest Jiangsu Region, September 2023 Third Prize , AFAC 2023 Financial Document Knowledge Extraction track, August 2023 Special Academic Scholarship of Soochow University, November 2022 Bronze medal ,The 2021 ICPC Asia Shenyang Regional Contest, 20 - 21 November 2021 Bronze medal ,The 2021 ICPC Asia Nanjing Regional Contest, 3 – 4 December 2021 Silver Medal , The 2021 ICPC China Shandong Provincial Programming Contest, 9 May 2021
